description: Part of the COMPLY portfolio, ComplySci provides cloud-based regulatory and compliance management software for financial institutions and asset managers. Features monitoring of employee trading, conflicts of interest, gift and entertainment logging, political contributions, and cryptocurrency compliance; supports workflows, case management, and REST API integrations. Supports over 7,000 clients including hedge funds, private equity, and large financial firms.

projects.name: ComplySci Compliance Software
projects.description: Developed and maintained cloud-based compliance management software for financial institutions, focusing on employee trading, conflicts of interest, and regulatory compliance.

achievements: Owned U.S. frontend development, building and maintaining Vue.js components to enhance user experience and performance.
Quickly ramped up on unfamiliar tech, becoming productive in Vue.js and contributing to .NET backend features.
Strengthened team delivery through effective communication with offshore developers, ensuring high-quality releases in a fast-paced Agile environment.
